text: @MSNBC @JulianCastro You,your brother&father are in the prayers of many tonight.I pray your father recovers&wish COVID19 didn’t take so much from us-the ability to be there when they are sick or dying,to offer comfort  of words,or holding their hand&letting them know we are there&they are not alone.
